name: ANIMAL MAGNETISM
description:
Winner of Philly Dev Night Toy Jam!

Things get freaky when Animals and Magnetism combine! Like summoning magnetic meteors that destroy everything they touch!

Play the HTML 5 version in your browser!

Mouse to drag and move animals, and to click buttons. "q" resets the game.

v0.95 from the Jam, check back soon for a few optimizations and additional sounds added!
